scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run _css-build-remote && npm run _templates-prebuild-watch && npm-run-all -p _media-server _storybook-watch _css-watch _templates-watch
scripts.start:nomedia: npm run clean && npm run _css-build-remote && npm run _templates-prebuild-watch && npm-run-all -p _css-watch _storybook-watch _templates-watch
scripts.storybook:build-release: npm run clean && npm run _css-build-remote && npm run _templates-build:release && build-storybook -o ./dist/storybook-build
scripts.storybook:build-sandbox: npm run clean && npm run _css-build-remote && npm run _templates-build:sandbox && build-storybook -o ./dist/storybook-build
